useCase.name: Change Robot State
useCase.description: Update the state of the robot.
useCase.trigger: Admin requests a state change for the robot.

mainSequence.step: Admin sends a request for a robot state change to Front-End System.
Front-End System processes the state change request.
Back-End System updates the robot state.
Back-End System sends the state change result to Front-End System.
Front-End System displays the outcome of the state change to Admin.
